summary: A treasure trove of loot to put dragon lairs, giant camps, and Mehrunes Dagon to shame.
descriptionHtml:
Giant camps. Dragon lairs. Dwarven ruins. Mehrunes Dagon's shrine. Pinewatch.

The best sources of loot in the game, and my favorite places to frequent. Heck, even Riften is full of it - 7 big chests in the castle, 3 thief caches, and the 5 lockpicking practice chests, not to mention the tribute chest.

So, taking inspiration from all of those, which - except for Dwarven ruins and Pinewatch - are quick in-and-out places, with a great return for little time, I have made Dead Dragon Giant Camp. Just a quick little place, in and out fairly quickly, but with great - and I mean absurdly fantastic - RESPAWNING loot.

Just north and slightly west of Whiterun, three giants have set up camp over a daring thief's hidden safehouse. They have just successfully defended their home against a dragon; how will YOU fare?

The map marker is pre-marked on your map, although you cannot fast travel to it until you reach it for the first time. There is a little story told through two journals. Learn the fate of those who dare defy the gods, and have not the blood of gods in their own veins.

I hope you enjoy! ^-^ (I know my loot-happy roommate will!)

HINT - If you can't find the key to the stash, read the journal on the table just outside the locked door. ^-^


[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

Al's Completionist Series:

5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30915]Als Vault of the Old Slayer -- Requires All 10 Dragon Claws[/url] -- [i]modestly sized dungeon rewarding the completionist player who collects all Dragon Claws in vanilla Skyrim with fantastic amounts of treasure[/i]

[b]Permissions[/b]

You may use any part of this mod in a mod of your own, as long as you fulfill all of the following conditions:

1. You must credit me.
2. You must notify me via PM.
3. You must put a link to my original mod, here, on your info page, and in your readme.
4. Your mod must NOT be a reupload or exact copy of mine.
5. I retain veto power (but I doubt I would ever use it). ^-^
6. You may not use any assets from my mods in anything that you charge for!
author: AlCiao
